パッケージ org.interledger.ilp

This package contains classes related to the core Interledger Protocol (ILP) which is the foundational protocol in the overall Interledger suite of protocols.

参照先: 説明

  • インタフェースのサマリー 
    インタフェース 説明
    InterledgerPayment
    Interledger Payments moves assets of one party to another that consists of one or more ledger transfers, potentially across multiple ledgers.
    InterledgerProtocolError
    Interledger errors may be generated at any point during an Interledger payment.
    InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode
    Inspired by HTTP Status Codes, ILP error codes are categorized based upon the intended behavior of the caller when they receive the given error.
  • クラスのサマリー 
    クラス 説明
    InterledgerPayment.AbstractInterledgerPayment  
    InterledgerPaymentBuilder
    Builds instances of type AbstractInterledgerPayment.
    InterledgerProtocolError.AbstractInterledgerProtocolError  
    InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode.Builder
    A builder for constructing instances of InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode.
    InterledgerProtocolErrorBuilder
    Builds instances of type AbstractInterledgerProtocolError.
  • 列挙型のサマリー 
    列挙型 説明
    InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode.ErrorFamily
    The family of an InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode, used as a grouping semantic, which is determined by the first letter of the error code's code value.

パッケージorg.interledger.ilpの説明

This package contains classes related to the core Interledger Protocol (ILP) which is the foundational protocol in the overall Interledger suite of protocols. For more details about the ILP core protocol, reference IL-RFC-3.
関連項目:
"https://github.com/interledger/rfcs/blob/master/0003-interledger-protocol"
